CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Alkylation of the thiophene ring was carried out by Kumada coupling , yielding 3-alkylthiophene as a colorless oil or a white solid ( 6-9 ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| ------------ |
| 3-alkylthiophene |
| thiophene ring |

In the given paragraph, the material names are "3-alkylthiophene" and "thiophene ring". The Kumada coupling is a method or reaction condition, not a material.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| ------------ |
| 3-alkylthiophene |
| thiophene ring |

The paragraph only mentions "3-alkylthiophene" and "thiophene ring" as material names. The "Kumada coupling" is a reaction condition or method used in the process, not a material.
